name: Cows Over The Moon
description:
Chill farming game made by 6 students.

Jack Baister - Hard Surface Artist

Jack Shergold - Environment Artist

James Minney - Hard Surface Artist

Joe Gregory - Character Artist

Mark Long - Designer/Programmer

Nathan Jolobe-Lawson - Designer/Programmer/UI Art/Sound

Upgrade, repair and use the workstations to upkeep the farm efficiently while listening to chill music and enjoying the pleasant scenery.

Controls:

Movement - W,A,S,D

Zoom in/out -Up arrow/Down arrow

Pause - P/Esc

Interact with screen UI - Left mouse button

Upgrade workstation - R

Repair workstation - E (hold)

Use workstation - F
